items.label: Charge View
items.colorMode: select phe, met, trp, ile, val, leu, ala, pro; color grey; select cys, asn, gln, thr, tyr, ser, gly, his, lys, arg, asp, glu; color magenta; select his, lys, arg; color [X3366ff]; select asp, glu; color [Xdd0000];
script: select all; wireframe off; spacefill 100%; halo off; select solvent; color [X3a79bc]; select ligand; color [X6dfa36];select dna; cartoon on; color [Xae00fe]; select rna; cartoon on; color [Xfd0162];

select phe, met, trp, ile, val, leu, ala, pro; color grey; select cys, asn, gln, thr, tyr, ser, gly, his, lys, arg, asp, glu; color magenta; select his, lys, arg; color [X3366ff]; select asp, glu; color [Xdd0000];

items.label: Composition of Protein,Water,Solvent,etc
script: select all; wireframe off; spacefill 100%; halo off; select protein; color [Xcbbe8a]; select dna; color [Xae00fe]; select rna; color [Xfd0162]; select solvent; color [X3a79bc]; select ligand; color [X6dfa36];

items.label: Primary Structure in Residue Color
script: select all; color cpk; wireframe off; spacefill off; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off;trace on; colour trace amino;

items.label: Primary Structure in Rainbow
script: select all; color cpk; wireframe off; spacefill off; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off;trace on; colour trace group;

items.label: Secondary Structure in Cartoon
script: select all; wireframe off; spacefill off; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off;cartoon on; colour structure;

items.label: Secondary Structure in Rocket
script: select all; wireframe off; spacefill off; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off;rocket 1.5; colour structure;

items.label: Ball & Stick
script: select all; wireframe 0.10; spacefill 20%; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off; halo off; colour none;

items.label: Space
script: select all; wireframe off; spacefill 150%; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off; halo off; colour chain;

items.label: Stick
script: select all; wireframe 0.50; spacefill 20%; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off; halo off; colour chain;

items.label: Line
script: select all; wireframe 0.10; spacefill 20%; trace off; ribbon off;cartoon off; rocket off;hbonds off; ssbonds off; halo off; colour chain;
